title: DNS and BIND on IPv6.epub
description: If you're preparing to roll out IPv6 on your network, this concise book provides the essentials you need to support this protocol with DNS. You'll learn how DNS was extended to accommodate IPv6 addresses, and how you can configure a BIND name server to run on the network. This book also features methods for troubleshooting problems with IPv6 forward- and reverse-mapping, techniques for helping islands of IPv6 clients communicate with IPv4 resources, and many other topics.
